name: Know an End
description:
Know an End

is a new zine with new and old poetry alike. 80 odd pages of the stuff.

Photography and formatting and poems by Quinn K.
Divider art by Óscar Mendo

Know an End

-> Know that life is finite
-> Know that anything comes to an end someday
-> Know that your projects need to have an end, need to be finished
-> Remember your goals
-> Know as much about the end as you can, study it, examine it closely until you can't anymore

Know an End

Because it will help more than you think.
